lines.text: declare integers n , m , j , ans and i , with ans = 0

lines.text: boy and girl are integer arrays with 200 elements filled with 0
bp and gp are integer arrays with 200 elements filled with 0
if boy [ i ] = 0 or girl [ j ] = 0
print ans and a new line
for i = 0 to ans exclusive print b [ i ] , " " , gp [ i ] and a new line
